description:
In a reversal of perspective, the Gekigangar crew settle down to watch the latest adventures of their favorite show: Martian Successor Nadesico! Unfortunately, with no time to put together new footage, the Nadesico crew instead present a clip show, including information on the ship, the crew, and all their adventures to date.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゲキ・ガンガー3 「熱血アニメ」でいこう
